srna_dict = {'seq_id': 'aaa', 'source': 'Refseq', 'feature': 'sRNA',
    'start': 3, 'end': 4, 'phase': '.', 'strand': '+', 'score': '.'}
attributes_srna = {'ID': 'sRNA0', 'Name': 'srna_0', 'sRNA_type': '3utr',
    'with_TSS': 'TSS_1', 'start_cleavage': 'cleavage3', 'end_cleavage':
    'cleavage10'}
srna = Create_generator(srna_dict, attributes_srna, 'gff')
tss_pro = ms.get_tss_pro('utr', srna)
self.assertEqual(tss_pro, ('TSS_1;cleavage3', 'cleavage10'))
